timeline.title: Timeline
lightmode.timeline.notifications.title: Your News feed is unavailable ...
lightmode.timeline.notifications: Because of an unprecedented amount of connections, your News feed and some widgets are temporarily inaccessible. The notification history will be restored later. Also, to notify you of news from your network, external notifications are always sent to the email address entered in My account.
lightmode.timeline.notifications.html:
Your News feed is unavailable ...

Because of an unprecedented amount of connections, your News feed and some widgets are temporarily inaccessible. The notification history will be restored later. Also, to notify you of news from your network, external notifications are always sent to the email address entered in My account.
